function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fear of passengers not following hygienic regimes","Impact":"Decreased feeling of safety and comfort among passengers","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns, strict enforcement of hygiene protocols","Technologies":"Monitoring systems for compliance with hygiene protocols","People":"Passengers, public transport users","Owner":"Local government, public transport authorities"},{"Description":"Overcrowding in public transport due to miscalculation","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, inability to maintain social distance","Mitigation":"Improving vehicle allocation and scheduling, promoting alternative modes of transport","Technologies":"Smart public transport management systems","People":"Passengers, public transport authorities","Owner":"City authorities, public transport authorities"},{"Description":"Limited or resigned use of public transport","Impact":"Reduced mobility options for residents, potential increase in private vehicle usage","Mitigation":"Improving safety measures, restoring confidence in public transport, promoting sustainable mobility options","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, real-time passenger information, air purification systems","People":"Residents, public transport users","Owner":"Local government, public transport authorities"}]}
